camel.sink.path.address.name: camel.sink.path.address
camel.sink.path.address.description: The geo address which should be prefixed with address:

camel.sink.path.latlng.name: camel.sink.path.latlng
camel.sink.path.latlng.description: The geo latitude and longitude which should be prefixed with latlng:

camel.sink.endpoint.headersOnly.name: camel.sink.endpoint.headersOnly
camel.sink.endpoint.headersOnly.description: Whether to only enrich the Exchange with headers, and leave the body as-is.

camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.name: camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer
camel.sink.endpoint.lazyStartProducer.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.sink.endpoint.serverUrl.name: camel.sink.endpoint.serverUrl
camel.sink.endpoint.serverUrl.description: URL to the geocoder server. Mandatory for Nominatim server.

camel.sink.endpoint.type.name: camel.sink.endpoint.type
camel.sink.endpoint.type.description: Type of GeoCoding server. Supported Nominatim and Google. One of: [NOMINATIM] [GOOGLE]

camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.name: camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding
camel.sink.endpoint.basicPropertyBinding.description: Whether the endpoint should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities

camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.name: camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous
camel.sink.endpoint.synchronous.description: Sets whether synchronous processing should be strictly used, or Camel is allowed to use asynchronous processing (if supported).

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthDomain.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthDomain
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthDomain.description: Proxy Authentication Domain to access Google GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthHost.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthHost
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthHost.description: Proxy Authentication Host to access Google GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthMethod.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthMethod
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthMethod.description: Authentication Method to Google GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthPassword.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthPassword
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthPassword.description: Proxy Password to access GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthUsername.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthUsername
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyAuthUsername.description: Proxy Username to access GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyHost.description: Proxy Host to access GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort.name: camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort
camel.sink.endpoint.proxyPort.description: Proxy Port to access GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.apiKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.apiKey
camel.sink.endpoint.apiKey.description: API Key to access Google. Mandatory for Google GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientId
camel.sink.endpoint.clientId.description: Client ID to access Google GeoCoding server.

camel.sink.endpoint.clientKey.name: camel.sink.endpoint.clientKey
camel.sink.endpoint.clientKey.description: Client Key to access Google GeoCoding server.

camel.component.geocoder.lazyStartProduc.name: camel.component.geocoder.lazyStartProducer
camel.component.geocoder.lazyStartProduc.description: Whether the producer should be started lazy (on the first message). By starting lazy you can use this to allow CamelContext and routes to startup in situations where a producer may otherwise fail during starting and cause the route to fail being started. By deferring this startup to be lazy then the startup failure can be handled during routing messages via Camel's routing error handlers. Beware that when the first message is processed then creating and starting the producer may take a little time and prolong the total processing time of the processing.

camel.component.geocoder.basicPropertyBi.name: camel.component.geocoder.basicPropertyBinding
camel.component.geocoder.basicPropertyBi.description: Whether the component should use basic property binding (Camel 2.x) or the newer property binding with additional capabilities
